messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5450100/diff/6002/misc/dashboard/builder/http.go
File misc/dashboard/builder/http.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5450100/diff/6002/misc/dashboard/builder/http.go#newcode104
misc/dashboard/builder/http.go:104: return dash("POST", "result", url.Values{"key": {b.key}}, obj{
please pull the obj{} literal into its own variable
to avoid the very odd indentation.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a2107270ac4a ***
